scripts.build: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && npx rimraf -- package-lock.json && cd ../src
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator --bundle
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator --bundle
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.ng.reset: cd ../demo-ng && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo.vue.reset: cd ../demo-vue && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-bottombar && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.ng.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-bottombar && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.plugin.vue.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo-vue && tns plugin remove nativescript-bottombar && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
scripts.clean.ng: npm run demo.ng.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
